Uses of Interface
io.github.ericmedvet.jnb.datastructure.Grid

Packages that use Grid
Package
Description
io.github.ericmedvet.jnb.buildable
 
io.github.ericmedvet.jnb.datastructure
Provides interfaces and classes for modeling a few data structures (e.g., Grid, Table) and useful concepts (e.g., NamedFunction, Parametrized).

  • Uses of Grid in io.github.ericmedvet.jnb.datastructure

    Classes in io.github.ericmedvet.jnb.datastructure that implement Grid
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    AbstractGrid<T>
    A partly abstract implementation of Grid.
    class 
    ArrayGrid<T>
    An implementation of Grid which internally stores the elements with an array.
    class 
    HashMapGrid<T>
    An implementation of Grid which internally stores the elements with an HashMap where keys are grid coordinates.
    Methods in io.github.ericmedvet.jnb.datastructure that return Grid
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    default Grid<T>
    Grid.copy()
    Creates a new grid with the same size and the same content (i.e., cell values) of this grid.
    static <T> Grid<T>
    Grid.create(int w, int h)
    Creates a new grid with the specified width w and height h and empty cells, i.e., with null values.
    static <T> Grid<T>
    Grid.create(int w, int h, BiFunction<Integer,Integer,T> fillerFunction)
    Creates a new grid with the specified width w and height h and by putting values generated with the provided fillerFunction.
    static <T> Grid<T>
    Grid.create(int w, int h, Function<Grid.Key,T> fillerFunction)
    Creates a new grid with the specified width w and height h and by putting values generated with the provided fillerFunction.
    static <T> Grid<T>
    Grid.create(int w, int h, List<T> ts)
    Creates a new grid with the specified width w and height h and by putting values taken from the provided list ts.
    static <T> Grid<T>
    Grid.create(int w, int h, T t)
    Creates a new grid with the specified width w and height h and the specified value t at each cell of the grid.
    static <T> Grid<T>
    GridUtils.fit(Grid<T> grid, Predicate<T> predicate)
    Returns the smallest grid which contains all the values of the provided grid which match the provided predicate.
    static <T> Grid<T>
    GridUtils.largestConnected(Grid<T> grid, Predicate<T> predicate, T emptyT)
    Returns a grid with the same size of the provided grid that contains only the values of the largest subset of grid values which are connected (i.e., belonging to the [von Neumann neighborhood](https://en.wikipedia
    default <S> Grid<S>
    Grid.map(BiFunction<Grid.Key,T,S> function)
    Creates a new grid of the same size of this grid with values obtained by applying the provided function to this grid coordinates and values.
    default <S> Grid<S>
    Grid.map(Function<T,S> function)
    Creates a new grid of the same size of this grid with values obtained by applying the provided function to this grid values.
    static <T> Grid<T>
    GridUtils.translate(Grid<T> grid, Grid.Key deltaKey)
    Returns a new grid obtained by "translating" the provided grid values by deltaKey.x() cells on the x-axis and deltaKey.y() cells on the y-axis.

    static <T> Collector<Grid.Entry<T>,?,Grid<T>>
    Grid.collector()
    Returns a Collector taking a stream of grid entries and returning the result as a grid.

    Method
    Description
    static <T> Grid.Key
    GridUtils.center(Grid<T> grid, Predicate<T> predicate)
    Returns the center of gravity of the provided grid values which match the provided predicate.
    static <T> double
    GridUtils.compactness(Grid<T> grid, Predicate<T> predicate)
    Returns a measure of the compactness of the Boolean grid obtained by testing the provided grid values against the provided predicate.

    GridUtils.count(Grid<T> grid, Predicate<T> predicate)

    Returns a measure of the elongation of the Boolean grid obtained by testing the provided grid values against the provided predicate.
    static <T> Grid<T>
    GridUtils.fit(Grid<T> grid, Predicate<T> predicate)
    Returns the smallest grid which contains all the values of the provided grid which match the provided predicate.
    static <T> int
    GridUtils.h(Grid<T> grid, Predicate<T> predicate)
    Returns the height of the smallest grid enclosing all the cell of the provided grid whose values match the provided predicate (the matching subgrid).
    static <T> int
    GridUtils.hammingDistance(Grid<T> grid1, Grid<T> grid2, boolean align)
    Returns a robust version of the Hamming distance between two grids, possibly aligning them.

    static String
    Grid.toString(Grid<Boolean> grid)
    Returns a compact string representation of a grid containing Boolean values.

    Grid.toString(Grid<T> grid, Function<Grid.Entry<T>,Character> function, String separator)
    Returns a compact string representation of a grid given a function to obtain char representations of cell values and a separator of rows.

    Grid.toString(Grid<T> grid, Function<T,Character> function)
